DOC.brief_summary: To determine prevalence sexual problem particularly premature ejaculation erectile dysfunction among men work factory Dongguan city , use self-rating scale like International Index Erectile Function , investigate characteristic risk factor associate sexual problem float population regression analysis .
DOC.brief_title: Male Reproductive Health Floating Population : Large-Scale Survey Dongguan
DOC.detailed_description: In China , float population special group people work live outside hometown without residence card area reside . Sexual problem common float population , majority sex active age . There lack study concern sexual problem , conduct survey investigate sexual dysfunction among men , especially float population , find whether sexual problem relate social life , medical illness , psychological status .
DOC.criteria: reach 18 year old live Dongguan 6 month float population without residence card young 18 year old live Dongguan le 6 month
